attributes.action: Provide more shelters for homeless animals
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do this as homeless animals well fair is priority and to many do not currently have shelter
attributes.background: I would like the government to provide more shelters for homeless animals

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Care for homeless animals is a matter for individual local authorities and animal rescue centres, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Provide Financial Assistance to Non-Profit Animal Rescue Charities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627172
